# bootstrapFP


[![CRAN\_Status\_Badge](https://www.r-pkg.org/badges/version/bootstrapFP)](https://cran.r-project.org/package=bootstrapFP)
[![](https://cranlogs.r-pkg.org/badges/grand-total/bootstrapFP)](https://cran.r-project.org/package=bootstrapFP)


## Description

This package provides bootstrap algorithms for Finite Population inference, for
the estimation of variance of the Horvitz--Thompson estimator.

## Installation

Currently, the package is only available on GitHub, and can be installed through
package *devtools*:
```{r install, eval=FALSE}

# if not present, install 'devtools' package
if( !require(devtools) ) install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("rhobis/bootstrapFP")
```
